titleStmt.title: Sample A06 from Newark Evening News, March 22, 1961, p.25
"Mitchell Replies.." by Bruce Bahrenburg "Paper Ballot End Sought" "Sheeran Backed by Roos" "Fire Warden Ends Career" "Hughes in Morris Debut" by John L. Cavnar "GOP Group Honors 15"

encodingDesc.p: Arbitrary Hyphen: peace-loving [0620]Typographical Errors: adminstration [0250]Nothing [for Noting] [0410]alloted [1680]
